company.name: TeaFable
company.tagline: The Magical Tale Behind TeaFable's Brew
company.description: Discover the enchanting journey of our carefully crafted teas, each with its own unique story.

cta.title: Be a Part of TeaFable's Magic Journey
cta.description: Join our community of tea lovers and experience the magic in every cup.

benefits.title: Energize
benefits.description: Start your day with our invigorating morning blends.

benefits.title: Relax
benefits.description: Unwind with our calming herbal infusions.

benefits.title: Inspire
benefits.description: Find creativity with our unique flavor combinations.

teas.name: Dragon Well Long Jing
teas.description: One of China's most famous green teas, known for its delicate, sweet flavor and flat, sword-shaped leaves.
teas.flavor: Sweet, vegetal, with a chestnut-like finish

teas.name: Tie Guan Yin
teas.description: A premium oolong tea with a complex floral aroma and a sweet, lingering aftertaste.
teas.flavor: Floral, orchid notes with a honey-like sweetness

teas.name: Jin Jun Mei
teas.description: A luxurious black tea made from delicate golden buds, producing a rich, honey-like sweetness.
teas.flavor: Sweet, malty, with honey and cocoa notes

teas.name: Silver Needle
teas.description: A delicate white tea made only from young tea buds, producing a light, sweet, and refreshing cup.
teas.flavor: Delicate, sweet, with melon and honey notes

teas.name: Pu-erh Tuo Cha
teas.description: A fermented tea known for its earthy flavor and potential health benefits, compressed into bowl-shaped pieces.
teas.flavor: Earthy, woody, with a smooth, rich texture
teas.brewing: 212°F for 2-3 minutes (can be steeped multiple times)

teas.name: Bi Luo Chun
teas.description: A famous green tea with tightly curled leaves that resemble small snails, producing a fruity and floral aroma.
teas.flavor: Fruity, floral, with a fresh, clean finish

teas.name: Da Hong Pao
teas.description: A highly prized oolong tea known as 'Big Red Robe', with a rich, mineral flavor and long-lasting aftertaste.
teas.flavor: Mineral, roasted, with orchid and honey notes

teas.name: Lapsang Souchong
teas.description: A distinctive black tea smoked over pine wood, creating a bold, smoky flavor profile.
teas.flavor: Smoky, pine, with a hint of sweetness

teas.name: White Peony
teas.description: A white tea made from buds and the first two leaves, offering a fuller flavor than Silver Needle.
teas.flavor: Mellow, sweet, with floral and honey notes
